title: PMS 2.0 270 - MNF Recap, TNF Preview, Aaron Rodgers, Ryan Clark, Josh McCown, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys recap last night's Monday Night Football game and how impressive Justin Herbert has been so far, look ahead to tonight's Tuesday Night Football game between the Bills and Titans, and give a few predictions. Joining Pat and AJ Hawk for another Aaron Rodgers Tuesday, is the Quarterback of the 4-0 Green Bay Packers, Aaron Rodgers. Pat, AJ, Aaron chat about what he did on his bye week, how much different things were than years past, what yesterday's practice after the bye week was like, his favorite Halloween costume ever, one place that he'd really like to travel to, and how he's feeling ahead of the Bucs game this weekend (12:40-55:34). Later, Super Bowl Champion, Pro Bowler, 12 Year NFL veteran at safety, and current ESPN NFL analyst, Ryan Clark joins the program. Pat and Ryan chat about Ryan's beef with Aaron Rodgers stemming from the Super Bowl, his thoughts about everything going on in the NFL currently, and why he's not afraid to call it like it is (57:47-1:22:16) Also joining the show is 18 Year NFL veteran at QB and current practice squad QB for the Philadelphia Eagles, and friend of the program, Josh McCown chats about his role with the Eagles this year, his thoughts on Carson Wentz so far, what he thinks Jalen Hurts will be like as a player, and his thoughts on coaching in the NFL after he retires. Stick around after the music for the biggest controversy coming out of the PMI office in quite some time. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we have reached 1 million subscribers and are giving away $100,000, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
